Class ArmijoWolfeSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simiacryptus.mindseye.opt.line.ArmijoWolfeSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LineSearchStrategy

    public class ArmijoWolfeSearch
extends Object
implements LineSearchStrategy
    Commonly used "loose" criteria for the line search iteration.
